Texts.Chs: 叶族人需要修修修修修好这个面板赶快让船动起来！
Texts.Eng: Floran fix thisss panel to wake ship up!

Texts.Chs: 紧张.我首先需要重新启动这个操作台与SAIL恢复沟通.
Texts.Eng: I first need to reboot this station to communicate with SAIL.

Texts.Chs: 如果我能把系统重启SAIL就可以恢复系统连线.
Texts.Eng: If I can reboot this station SAIL should come back online!

Texts.Chs: 重新启动系统能让我和SAIL恢复通讯.
Texts.Eng: Rebooting this station should enable me to talk to SAIL.

Texts.Chs: 这个面板能允许我和SAIL交互，我需要赶紧重启它.
Texts.Eng: This console will allow me to communicate with SAIL. I need to reboot it first.

Texts.Chs: 是时候赶紧重启这个面板了，我需要和SAIL保持联系.
Texts.Eng: Time to reboot this station so I can talk to SAIL.

Texts.Chs: 过会儿系统重启上线后，我就能通过这个面版和SAIL交流了.
Texts.Eng: When it's working, I can talk to SAIL through this console.
